A

AbstractGrid<E> - info.gridworld.grid 中的 类
AbstractGrid contains the methods that are common to grid implementations.
AbstractGrid() - 类 info.gridworld.grid.AbstractGrid 的构造方法
 
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Actor 中的方法
Reverses the direction of this actor.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Bug 中的方法
Moves if it can move, turns otherwise.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Critter 中的方法
A critter acts by getting a list of other actors, processing that list, getting locations to move to, selecting one of them, and moving to the selected location.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Flower 中的方法
Causes the color of this flower to darken.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Jumper 中的方法
Moves if it can move, turns otherwise.
act() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Rock 中的方法
Overrides the act method in the Actor class to do nothing.
Actor - info.gridworld.actor 中的 类
An Actor is an entity with a color and direction that can act.
Actor() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Actor 的构造方法
Constructs a blue actor that is facing north.
ActorWorld - info.gridworld.actor 中的 类
An ActorWorld is occupied by actors.
ActorWorld() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld 的构造方法
Constructs an actor world with a default grid.
ActorWorld(Grid<Actor>) - 类 info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld 的构造方法
Constructs an actor world with a given grid.
add(Location, Actor) - 类 info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld 中的方法
Adds an actor to this world at a given location.
add(Actor) - 类 info.gridworld.actor.ActorWorld 中的方法
Adds an occupant at a random empty location.
add(Location, T) - 类 info.gridworld.world.World 中的方法
Adds an occupant at a given location.
addGridClass(String) - 类 info.gridworld.world.World 中的方法
Adds a class to be shown in the "Set grid" menu.
addOccupantClass(String) - 类 info.gridworld.world.World 中的方法
Adds a class to be shown when clicking on an empty location.
AHEAD - 类 info.gridworld.grid.Location 中的静态变量
The turn angle for making no turn.

B

BoundedGrid<E> - info.gridworld.grid 中的 类
A BoundedGrid is a rectangular grid with a finite number of rows and columns.
BoundedGrid(int, int) - 类 info.gridworld.grid.BoundedGrid 的构造方法
Constructs an empty bounded grid with the given dimensions.
Bug - info.gridworld.actor 中的 类
A Bug is an actor that can move and turn.

Constructs a red bug.
Bug(Color) - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Bug 的构造方法
Constructs a bug of a given color.

C

canMove() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Bug 中的方法
Tests whether this bug can move forward into a location that is empty or contains a flower.
canMove() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Jumper 中的方法
Tests whether this Jumper can move forward into a location that is empty or contains a flower.
compareTo(Object) - 类 info.gridworld.grid.Location 中的方法
Compares this location to other for ordering.
Critter - info.gridworld.actor 中的 类
A Critter is an actor that moves through its world, processing other actors in some way and then moving to a new location.
Critter() - 类 info.gridworld.actor.Critter 的构造方法

Grid provides an interface for a two-dimensional, grid-like environment containing arbitrary objects.
